overview: Bryan Sise is co-founder and Director of Product Marketing at Dynamic Signal. Prior to co-founding Dynamic Signal, Bryan was a product marketing director and early employee with Adify. Earlier, he managed an eBay/GE partnership where he co-launched the eBay MasterCard, completed GEâ€™s Experienced Commercial Leadership Program, and founded Athletic Motion, a venture-backed sports digital media company. Bryan holds an MBA and an MA from Columbia University, and a BA Psychology from Reed College.
